dict.acceptation: 激情，热情；热心，爱好；热恋；酷爱；
[诗歌用语]表露强烈感情，显示巨大热情；

sent.orig: His passion for cleanliness and order on his passion for fried food and baked goods.
sent.trans: 他对于洁癖和油炸烘烤食品有着无比的热情。

sent.orig: Weeks later, the passion will grow cold and months later, that passion may be gone forever.
sent.trans: 几周后，热情就会冷却；数月后，也许就会永远消失了。

sent.orig: Only passion, great passion, can elevate the human soul to achieve great things.
sent.trans: 只有热情，巨大的热情，才能激发人的灵魂去成就大事。

sent.orig: Madden passion of the most dynamic bicycle Hey the most cutting-edge popular music, passion thorough release.
sent.trans: 激情劲爆的动感单车最嗨最前卫最流行的音乐，激情彻彻底底的释放。
